name: fat_roi_row.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: Select a single ROI's row out of a connectivity matrix file (*.grid or *.netcc) for viewing and/or further analysis.

inputs.description: Specify which ROI's row of connectivity you want to select out. If labeltables were used, you may select the ROI by either the string label or the ROI mask number.
inputs.name: ROI

inputs.description: Provide the set of matrix (*.grid or *.netcc) files by searchable path. This can be a globbable entry in quotes containing wildcard characters.
inputs.name: Matrix files

inputs.description: Provide the set of matrix (*.grid or *.netcc) files by explicit path in a text file. The LIST text file must contain at least one column with the path to subject matrix file.
inputs.name: List file

inputs.description: Switch to turn off the writing/usage of user-defined labels in the *.grid/*.netcc files.
inputs.name: Extern Labs No

output-files.description: Selected ROI row output file in .row format.
output-files.name: Output file
